name: Fire Defence - Mini Jam 94 Baking
description:
A short long simple survival game made for the Mini Jam 94 BAKING with the limitation to use only 2 buttons.

In this game you act as Farty- the marshmellow who is protecting fire from snowstorms so that its ship can be baked, necessary for return to its planet Marshmellion.

You will gain health as time passes and sometimes will be required to hit yourself delibrately with the snowball to protect the fire.

Controls: (Keyboard + On Screen Touch )

LEFT ARROW - To move Left

RIGHT ARROW - To move Right

LEFT ARROW + RIGHT ARROW = To Jump
